projects.name: Trädgård Passion
projects.description: Trädgård Passion is a personal website that promotes the joy and benefits of year-round gardening.

projects.name: Planned Planthood CSS
projects.description: A responsive gardening planner designed for organizing plant care tasks.

projects.name: Pokedex
projects.description: A modern Pokédex interface built with Tailwind CSS. It displays Pokémon data in a responsive and visually engaging format.

projects.name: Pizzeria
projects.description: An interactive web app for ordering from a virtual pizzeria. Multi-menu options, age-based pricing, and a responsive design.

projects.name: E-commerce
projects.description: An e-commerce platform with dynamic routing, admin dashboard, and product filtering.

projects.name: Library
projects.description: A book exploration app featuring advanced search, category filters, and a responsive layout. Ideal for browsing and discovering new reads.

projects.name: Planet Chatbot
projects.description: A travel agency chatbot with a simple interface and basic conversational interactions. Designed to assist users with travel inquiries.

projects.name: Counter Passenger
projects.description: A futuristic passenger counter app that saves history and offers a sleek interface. Useful for tracking and managing passenger flow.

projects.name: Basketball Scoreboard
projects.description: A basketball scoreboard app with keyboard shortcuts for fast score updates.

projects.name: Weather App
projects.description: A weather app with a 4-day forecast, dynamic background, and city search functionality.
